resources.string: Enter points of your function into fields and tap -Add- button to add point. When you tap -Stop- button, entering will be end and button -Build-, will become enable. Tap on button -Build-, build your graph and interpolated graph. Start graph draw by red line, and interpolated graph draw by green line. Tap on menu item -Load data from file- download data from file, which is in resources, named example.xml. Tap on menu item -Create report- send you to activity when you can modify report and save it into the file. Tap button -Save- in modify report activity, will save yours report with name, which you write under the report in the correct field @create by Alex
